completed_steps.title: Git/GitHub bridge established
completed_steps.receipt: HTTPS auth failed; switched to SSH; push to main working.

completed_steps.title: Repo initialized + first pushes
completed_steps.receipt: Remote set; commits pushed to origin/main.

completed_steps.title: Create repo structure folders
completed_steps.receipt: data/{caches,reports,actions,timelines,profiles} + input/output + tests created.

completed_steps.title: Add .gitkeep placeholders + push
completed_steps.receipt: Folders tracked cleanly.

completed_steps.title: Set git identity
completed_steps.receipt: user.name=Trevor Reynolds; user.email set.

completed_steps.title: Add .gitignore
completed_steps.receipt: Ignore OS/editor, python env, audio, generated json, logs.

completed_steps.title: Python package skeleton (src layout)
completed_steps.receipt: pyproject.toml + src/flaas + CLI entrypoint created.

completed_steps.title: Create venv + install editable
completed_steps.receipt: python3 -m venv .venv; pip install -e .; flaas --version works.

completed_steps.title: OSC ping (fire-and-forget)
completed_steps.receipt: flaas ping sends /live/test.

completed_steps.title: Ignore build artifacts
completed_steps.receipt: *.egg-info removed from git and ignored.

completed_steps.title: Scan stub writes model_cache.json
completed_steps.receipt: flaas scan creates data/caches/model_cache.json.

completed_steps.title: Validate scan stub output
completed_steps.receipt: cat data/caches/model_cache.json shows stub payload.

completed_steps.title: WAV analyzer added
completed_steps.receipt: peak dBFS + LUFS-I to data/reports/analysis.json.

completed_steps.title: Validate analyzer
completed_steps.receipt: Generated sine WAV; analysis produced expected peak/LUFS values.

completed_steps.title: Compliance targets + check command
completed_steps.receipt: flaas check writes data/reports/check.json (pass/fail flags).

completed_steps.title: Ignore generated report JSON
completed_steps.receipt: data/reports/*.json ignored; removed tracked analysis.json.

completed_steps.title: Validate check output
completed_steps.receipt: flaas check input/test.wav shows LUFS fail, peak pass.

completed_steps.title: Plan actions (plan-gain)
completed_steps.receipt: Generate data/actions/actions.json from analysis.

completed_steps.title: Validate planned actions file
completed_steps.receipt: cat data/actions/actions.json shows planned Utility.Gain action.

completed_steps.title: Apply dry-run
completed_steps.receipt: flaas apply prints DRY_RUN action lines.

completed_steps.title: Makefile dev target
completed_steps.receipt: make dev sets up venv + editable install.

completed_steps.title: README quickstart
completed_steps.receipt: README.md added with commands/structure.

completed_steps.title: OSC request/response (RPC) ping
completed_steps.receipt: Added listener on 11001; request_once() added.

completed_steps.title: Install AbletonOSC remote script
completed_steps.receipt: Cloned AbletonOSC into User Library Remote Scripts; loaded in Live.

completed_steps.title: Fix /live/test argument
completed_steps.receipt: Ping now sends 'ok' and expects ('ok',) reply.

completed_steps.title: Real OSC connectivity verified
completed_steps.receipt: flaas ping --wait returns ok: ('ok',).

completed_steps.title: Readback + getters exploration
completed_steps.receipt: Moved to supported /live/song/get and /live/track/get endpoints.

completed_steps.title: Real scan implemented
completed_steps.receipt: scan_live() queries tracks/devices and fingerprints set.

completed_steps.title: Utility device detection
completed_steps.receipt: Track 0 device 0 shows Utility class StereoGain.

completed_steps.title: Utility Gain param id discovered
completed_steps.receipt: parameters/name shows Gain is param_id=9 (in names[2:]).

completed_steps.title: Normalized parameter semantics
completed_steps.receipt: Confirmed parameter/value uses 0..1; device min/max returned -1..1 for Utility Gain.

completed_steps.title: Linear mapping utilities
completed_steps.receipt: Added util-gain-norm and util-gain-linear; mapping via min/max to norm.

completed_steps.title: Apply uses device param mapping
completed_steps.receipt: apply writes Utility Gain param via /live/device/set/parameter/value.

completed_steps.title: Loop + verify + reset
completed_steps.receipt: loop (analyze→plan→apply), verify readback, reset center.

completed_steps.title: Actions schema + fingerprint
completed_steps.receipt: actions.json includes schema_version + live_fingerprint; apply enforces.

completed_steps.title: Plan/apply stability
completed_steps.receipt: apply is relative delta; plan emits bounded deltas (±0.25) and loop stops near max.

completed_steps.title: Version bump + docs
completed_steps.receipt: bumped to 0.0.2; added remaining MVP blocks + manual loop docs.

completed_steps.title: Export guide + verify-audio
completed_steps.receipt: export-guide prints settings; verify-audio prints PASS/FAIL and exit code.

limitations: Single actuator only (Utility Gain on track 0 device 0)
